New Records: Rilee Rossouw became the first South African batter to score a ton in T20 World Cup and overall the 10th player in the world.
Rilee Rossouw became the first South African batter to slam a century in T20 World Cup.
Rilee Rossouw and Gustav McKeon are the only batters to score consecutive T20I centuries.
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw stitched a 168-run stand off just 85 balls to help South Africa get to a score of 205 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: Despite losing skipper Temba Bavuma early, South Africa made a statement as the two left-hander Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw came out with positive intent and smashed all the Bangladesh bowlers around.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rilee Rossouw smashed a terrific century against Bangladesh to help South Africa get to a score of 205 runs in the T20 World Cup Group 2 game.
